title: Prince Andrew: Fall From Grace | Timeline of Duke's Downfall | 9 News Australia Documentary
description: Prince Andrew. War hero, Queen Elizabeth's favourite son, the Duke of York. Born into a life of privilege and duty, destined to serve the Crown as a senior member of the Royal Family. But the gilded life masked a very different one in private. A shadow loomed, cast by the Prince's relationship with Jeffrey Epstein. The world watched as a disastrous television interview turned scandal into catastrophe. It was the beginning of the end for Andrew. It set in motion his downfall. His titles stripped. His reputation.. in ruins.  For the first time in generations, a British Prince has been banished. This is a detailed documentary timeline of how the King's brother lost everything. The extraordinary story of Prince Andrew, Duke of York, whose life of privilege and duty unravelled due to his association with convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein and the sexual assault allegations by Virginia Giuffre.  This video traces the complete timeline of the scandal, from the initial connections and the explosive 2019 BBC Newsnight interview, through the civil lawsuit, the removal of his military titles, and the final, historic move by King Charles to strip his brother of all remaining royal styles, titles, and honours. It details the public outrage, the "Pizza Express" alibi, the multi-million-dollar out-of-court settlement, and his ultimate exile from public life.
